info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 14 at 11:50PM MST until August 15 at 1:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MST MONDAY FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 1150 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain continue across the warned area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain has fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Golden Valley and Chloride. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
